attributes.action: introduce a moderate insurance system for cyclists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that, as road users who have the potential to be involved in road accidents, cyclists should have insurance. The fact that the bicycle is on the road, not the motorising of the transport, creates a liability which should be covered.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
